newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - IMC Mortgage started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - IMC Mortgage started.

text.p: -- Oppenheimer analyst Steve Eisman confirmed he started coverage of IMC Mortgage Co as outperform.

-- Eisman said the stock has done well since its June initial public offering at $18 a share. "Our thesis on the group is that consumers are overleveraged and investors should avoid credit card stocks but buy home equity companies because they're beneficiaries of overleveraged consumers."
-- He has a $40 12-month price target. The stock closed at 34 Monday.
-- The analyst set share earnings estimates of $1.72 for 1996 and $2.70 for 1997, compared with the $0.51 a share the company earned a year ago.
